title: $1,000 Off move in!! Call for more info!
posting_body: ['Welcome to your new home at Mojave Flats in Las Vegas, NV!', 'Mojave Flats invites you to start your new Las Vegas lifestyle.', 'Find yourself embracing an apartment community that is full of endless opportunities for entertainment, and relaxation.', 'Our apartments for rent in Las Vegas, give you the perfect combination of comfort at home, and convenience to be out on the town.', 'Here you’ll find stunning features and a spectacular location.', 'We offer 1, 2, & 3 bedroom apartments that bring you everything you need at your fingertips.', 'Come home to our Las Vegas apartments, and experience the first-hand comfort, and amenities built just for you.', 'Dive into life at a location that is nestled near all of the top local attractions.', 'Our Las Vegas apartments for rent will bring you the beauty of nearby scenery, and the convenience of your local neighborhood.', 'Come enjoy the benefits of city life, combined with the rewards of high-class apartment living.', 'Make Mojave Flats in Las Vegas, NV your home, and join our community today.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Want more information?', 'Follow this link:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 688 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Fully Equipped Kitchen', '- Pet Friendly', '- Additional Storage Available', '- Washer & Dryer', '- Air Conditioning', '- Balcony/Patio', 'Community Amenities', '- On Site Management', '- Covered Parking', '- Controlled Access', '- Swimming Pool', '- Dog Park', '- BBQ and Picnic Area', '- Playground', '- Business Center', '- Professional & Responsive Management', '- Clubhouse', '- Fitness Center', '- Package Receiving', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet friendly, contact for details.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Mojave Flats', '2666 S. Decatur Blvd, Las Vegas, NV, 89102', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', '4QZrvxQTy']
